a:r.a:t: Curated Where It Matters, Open Where It Wins. Risk-scored components, audited layers, and transparent rules

Tokens are scored on top holders, dev holdings, sniper/insider/bundler patterns, LP-burned, paid status, etc. Penalties apply beyond thresholds; only reliable components pass for L1/L2 official Indices.
L1/L2 = curated & periodically rebalanced; L3 = permissionless playground (direct create/burn, no AMM until graduation) & partner/trending indices.
Fully asset-backed baskets with on-chain visibility; rebalancing rules are clear and governance-driven.
sparent, risk-scored indices backed by fully on-chain assets, delivering trust and long-term stability.
All assets are verifiable on-chain, ensuring index tokens are always fully collateralized.
Rules for rebalancing and governance are published, auditable, and enforced by smart contracts.
Engine Structured and engineered by Jaeso Choi, KOFIA Certified Investment Manager.
